```{r setup}
library(Pandora)
```


To list all available repositories use the `getRepositories()` function. You can
filter the output by the arguments `network` and `pattern`. For example if you
want to list all repositories and their corresponding author from the network 
`IsoMemo` you can use:

```{r}
getRepositories(network = "IsoMemo")[c("Repository", "Author")]
```
